children.name: Process Discovery
Improve on-time delivery performance & Reduce Manufacturing Cycle Time​
Cycle Time Process Order creation – Process Order: Set Deletion Flag​

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
(Select last(end_time) Filter(
Where event_name IN ('Deletion Flag')))
-
(Select first(end_time) Filter(
Where event_name IN ('Create Process Order')))
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Time difference planned vs actual start date

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Start Date" - "Actual Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Time difference planned vs actual end date

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Finish Date" - "Actual Finish Date" 
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Reduce manufacturing costs & Process Harmonization​
# Completed Process Orders without deletion flag​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Technically completed')
AND "Deletion Flag" is null

children.name: # Process Orders without technical complete​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE not event_name MATCHES ('Technically completed')

children.name: AVG Eckenddatum – Eckstartdatum

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Basic Finish Date" - "Basic Start Date" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Anzahl Teilrückmeldungen

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name)
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
Where event_name = 'Partially confirmed'

children.name: Teilrückmeldungen pro Tag

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', end_time) AS "Day", COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Partially confirmed'
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST

children.name: Copy of AVG Eckenddatum – Eckstartdatum over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', end_time) AS "Day", COUNT (EVENT_NAME)
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE EVENT_NAME = 'Partially confirmed'
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('DAY'), NULL

children.name: Olap Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, 
"Planned Release Date", 
"Scheduled Release date",
"Actual Release Date", 
"Scheduled Start Date", 
"Actual Start Date",     
"Scheduled Finish Date", 
"Confirmed Finish Date",
"Actual Finish Date", 
"Basic Start Date",
"Basic Finish Date",
"Planned Order Opening Date",
"Planned Order Start Date",   
"Actual Delivery Date",
"Planned Order Actual Delivery Date",
"Basic Finish Date"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Limit 10

children.name: Process & Conformance Improvements​
# Process Orders without Planned Order​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Planned Order Number" is null

children.name: AVG Difference planned vs actual quantity (Process order)​

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Total Order Quantity" - "Produced Delivered Quantity" 
) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where event_name MATCHES ('Delivered')

children.name: AVG Difference planned vs actual quantity (Process order)​ over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', (SELECT FIRST (end_time))) AS "Month", AVG ("Total Order Quantity" - "Produced Delivered Quantity")
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Delivered')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Table

dataSource.query:
SELECT case_id, 
"Total Order Quantity" , "Produced Delivered Quantity" 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
Where event_name MATCHES ('Delivered')

children.name: # Process Orders without business complete

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE not event_name MATCHES ('Confirmed')

children.name: General
Number of Process orders ​

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(case_id) as "# Process Orders"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Process orders ​ grouped by PO Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "# Process Orders", "Process Order Type"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
order by 1 desc

children.name: Number of Process orders ​ grouped by PO Profit Center

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (CASE_ID) AS "# Process Orders", "Profit Center"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
order by 1 desc

children.name: # Process Order Confirmations

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name) as "# Process Order Confirmations"
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
Where event_name IN ('Confirmed')

children.name: # Process Order Confirmations per Month​ over time

dataSource.query:
SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', end_time) AS "Month", COUNT (EVENT_NAME) AS "# Process Order Confirmations"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Confirmed')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH'), NULL

children.name: Bar Chart

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name) as "# Process Orders", event_name 
FROM FLatten(THIS_PROCESS)
Where event_name in ('Create Sales Order', 'Create Process Order', 'Released', 'Confirmed','Partially confirmed', 'Delivered','Partially delivered', 'Technically Completed', 'Deletion Flag')
order by 1 desc

children.name: Automation
# Events grouped by User Type

dataSource.query:
SELECT count(event_name) as "# Events", 
event_name as "Event", 
"Event Created By User Type" as "User Type" 
FROM Flatten(THIS_PROCESS)
order by 1 desc

children.name: Validation
Activity List
Process Variants
Time difference planned vs actual end date

dataSource.query:
SELECT avg(
"Scheduled Finish Date" - "Actual Finish Date" 
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS
